Gumdrop

Uses of Package
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns

  • Packages that use org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns
    DNS server implementation for Gumdrop.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp
    SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.auth
    Email authentication (SPF, DKIM, DMARC) for SMTP.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns 
    Class Description
    DNSCache
    In-memory cache for DNS responses.
    DNSClass
    DNS record classes.
    DNSFormatException
    Exception thrown when a DNS message cannot be parsed.
    DNSMessage
    A DNS protocol message.
    DNSQueryCallback
    Callback interface for asynchronous DNS query results.
    DNSQuestion
    A question in a DNS query.
    DNSResourceRecord
    A DNS resource record.
    DNSType
    DNS resource record types.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp 
    Class Description
    DNSResolver
    Asynchronous DNS resolver using non-blocking I/O.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.auth 
    Class Description
    DNSResolver
    Asynchronous DNS resolver using non-blocking I/O.
